std::sort times for int data
ratio is time/(n*ln(n))

size (n)	time(ms)	ratio
10,000,000	804		4.98818233500306E-06
20,000,000	1668		4.96096575582377E-06
30,000,000	2570		4.97578671643108E-06
40,000,000	3500		4.99874602540415E-06
50,000,000	4421		4.98772148329694E-06
60,000,000	5342		4.9711922701699E-06
